import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Navbar, Nav, NavDropdown, Jumbotron, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { BrowserRouter, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import HomePage from './index'; import Instruction from './instructions'; import BondPricingOne from './bond_pricing_individual'; import BondPricingTwo from './bond_pricing_spreadsheet'; import BondExample from './bond_example'; import logo from '../images/logo.png'; import '../index.css' class Navigation extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { }; } render() { return ( HOME INSTRUCTIONS BOND EXAMPLE INDIVIDUAL SPREADSHEET

Quickly and easily price your savings bonds!

Value, aggregate, and export any set of I, E, EE Series bonds or Savings Notes.

Choose an option:

Price bonds individually Price bonds from spreadsheet
HOW WE DO IT

The provides historical value files for I, E/EE Series bonds and savings notes. We use a database schema built from these source files to evaluate the price of your bond(s).

WHAT YOU'LL NEED

) } } export default Navigation;
